The “Las Emprendedoras” (The Enterprising Ones) committee is in its 8th cycle.  It has 16 members who work very actively and with much discipline because they have petty cash and savings thanks to which they can take out the next loan.

Petronila, one of the group members, works selling merchandise from place to place.  She is a very enterprising, hardworking person who manages to get ahead with much effort.  She will use the loan to buy merchandise like clothes and remedies, among others.

loans.use: to buy merchandise like clothes and remedies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy chairs and tables and renovate his cafe.

loans.name: Jose Mariano

texts.es: El Sr. Jose mariano de 33 años de edad, casado tiene más de 6 años viviendo en casa propia la cual fue un regalo de su padre. El cuenta con su taller mecánico y ya tiene un buen número de clientes, se ha distinguido su negocio por el buen carácter y el buen trabajo que hacen en su taller. Su esposa es ama de casa y le ayuda brindándole su apoyo y paciencia. Ellos solicitan un crédito para compra de maquinaria y equipo para que su negocio siga creciendo y pueda estar a la altura de las circunstancias que los clientes demandan.
texts.en: José Mariano, 33, is married and has been living in his own house for more than six years; it was a gift from his father.  He has a car repair shop and a good number of customers.  He’s stood out in business for his good character and for the good work that’s done in his shop.  His wife is a housewife and helps him by providing support and patience.  They are requesting a loan to buy machinery and equipment so that the business will continue to grow and can be up to meeting customer demand.

loans.use: to buy machinery and equipment.

loans.name: Lubov

texts.ru:
Любовь очередной раз обращается за кредитом КИВА в размере 12 000 гривен для того, чтобы приобрести детскую осеннюю одежду и обувь для школьников под реализацию перед началом нового учебного года. Она собирается закупить партию товара оптом и хочет вложить дополнительно свои 15 000 гривен для этого.
Лето выдалось для Любови нелегким, так как это всегда сезон тяжелой работы, однако, она не жалуется, потому что в магазине хорошо шла торговля. К тому же предыдущий кредит от КИВА оказал такую своевременную помощь Любови и она смогла закупить пленку и рассаду помидор, ведь выручки в магазине тогда не было достаточно, а начинать сельскохозяйственный сезон нужно было пораньше. Любови нравится заниматься и магазином, и фермерским делом, однако последнее – это лишь сезонный источник прибыли.
texts.en:
Lubov is turning to Kiva for another loan in the amount of 12,000 hryvnia in order to purchase children's autumn clothes and footwear before the beginning of the new school year. She plans to contribute 15,000 hryvnia of her own toward the purchase of this shipment of merchandise. 

Lubov's summer was not easy, with a lot of hard work as usual, but she is not complaining as business went well. Furthermore, her previous Kiva loan gave her timely help with purchasing plastic greenhouse covering and tomato seedlings at a time when her business' profits would have been insufficient to allow her to get an early start to the farming season. Lubov loves being involved in both retail and agriculture, although the latter only provides a seasonal source of income.

loans.use: to purchase children's clothing and footwear before the start of the new school year

loans.name: Leticia

texts.es: La Sra. Leticia de 45 años de edad es casada y tiene 3 hijos dos que ya están casados y un pequeño de 2 años aproximadamente. Ella y su esposo tienen un negocio familiar es una tienda de abarrotes, el cual está ubicado en su propio domicilio, ellos se han caracterizado siempre por su trato amable a los clientes es por eso que el negocio está creciendo. Leticia solicita de nuestra ayuda para invertir en su negocio en la compra de mercancía, y mejoras al negocio. Ella agradecerá la ayuda que se pueda brindar.
texts.en: Leticia, 45, is married and has three children who are already married and a little one who is about 2-years-old.  She and her husband have a family business: a grocery store located at home.  They have always been noted for their kind customer service and this is why the business is growing.  Leticia is asking for help to invest in her business buying merchandise and also making some improvements to it.  She will be grateful for any help she might get.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy used clothing for resale.

loans.name: Nadezhda

texts.ru:
Последний кредит КИВА Надежда использовала для того, чтобы добавить себе еще одно торговое место и оборудовать его. Со временем она надеется еще больше благоустроить эту торговую точку и установить роллеты. За счет полученной прибыли смогла планировать учебу старшего сына в колледже, а также даже позволила себе приобрести шубу в конце весны. 
В этот раз Надежде понадобился кредит в размере 14 000 гривен для того, чтобы приобрести партию женских блуз и мужских рубашек на осенний сезон. Надежда намерена работать не покладая рук, чтобы со временем скопить деньги и приобрести для семьи более новый автомобиль.
texts.en:
Nadezhda used her last Kiva loan to set up and outfit another retail location. In time, she hopes to improve this location even further and to install shutters. Using her profits, she was able to plan her oldest son's college education, and also allowed herself to buy a fur coat at the end of the spring.

This time, Nadezhda needs a loan of 14,000 hryvnia in order to purchase a shipment of women's blouses and men's shirts for the fall season. She plans to work tirelessly in order to save enough money to buy a newer family car.

loans.use: to buy women's blouses and men's shirts for the fall season

loans.name: Verónica Beatriz

texts.es: Verónica vive junto a su esposo e hijos, con el deseo de contar con una vida mejor, Verónica posee una pequeña venta de granos básicos, aceite, jabón, pastas dentales y otros productos perecederos, su negocio es muy estable ya que tiene una ubicación muy buena debido a que se encuentra en el mercado central de su lugar de vivienda, por lo que cuenta con varios clientes fijos, ganancias con las que ha logrado mantener estable su negocio. Verónica desea incrementar la cantidad de productos que tiene y así mismo tener productos nuevos como: detergentes y suavizantes para la ropa, y más. De esta forma Verónica espera mejorar sus ingresos para contar con una vida mejor.
texts.en: Veronica lives with her husband and children and wishes to be able to achieve a better life.  Veronica has a small business selling basic grains, oil, soap, toothpaste and other basic products.  Her business is very stable since she is at a good location which is in the central market area of where she lives.  She has several steady customers and profits that have enabled her to maintain a secure business.  Veronica would like to increase the amount of the products that she has and also add some new ones such as detergents and softeners for clothing and others.  In this manner Veronica expects to increase her income and have a better way of life.

loans.use: to purchase detergents to stock her business.

loans.name: Maritza

texts.es:
Maritza tiene 42 años, es una mujer fuerte y luchadora. Está separa del que fue su esposo y tuvo que criar a su hijo ella sola; pero él ya es mayor e independiente. Ahora ella vive sola en su casa propia y lo que más desea es poder trabajar para así generar los recursos que le permitan disfrutar de una vejez tranquila.

Su trabajo es la confección de prendas de vestir, muchas veces espera que el cliente venga y le pida un diseño o la refacción de alguna prenda, en otras ocasiones ella misma se inspira en nuevos diseños y crea sus propias prendas. También se dedica a confeccionar sabanas y cortinas para venderlas entre sus clientes, familiares y amigos. Su taller está ubicado en su casa, donde acondicionó un lugar para trabajar tranquila. Lleva realizando este negocio por 11 años y con el tiempo aprendió a darle un buen acabado a su trabajo. Le gusta lo que hace, pues es independiente, tiene su propio horario de trabajo y además le brinda a otras personas la oportunidad de laborar, ya que en ciertas temporadas contrata personal cuando tiene demasiados pedidos y no se abastece ella sola. Recuerda mucho cómo se inició en esta actividad, ya que trabajaba para otra persona y buscó consolidar su propio negocio y esa decisión acertada ahora se refleja en los ingresos que percibe. Desea continuar realizando su trabajo y más adelante poder tener un taller más grande con más máquinas y más trabajadores.

Este es su cuarto préstamo con la institución MFP, por ello agradece a las personas que hacen posible su crédito y le dan la oportunidad de continuar trabajando para lograr sus objetivos, además está comprometida al pago puntual de sus cuotas con mucha responsabilidad. 

Con el monto solicitado, 1000 soles, comprará materiales como hilos, agujas, botones, telas, forros y blondas para continuar confeccionando las prendas de vestir y las sábanas que pone a la venta. También comprará algunos útiles que le hacen falta renovar.
texts.en:
Maritza, 42, is a strong woman and a fighter. She is separated since her husband left and she had to raise her child by herself. But he is grown and independent now. Now she lives alone in her own house and what she wants most is to be able to work to generate income that will allow her to enjoy a peaceful old age.

Her work is clothes-making. Many times, she waits for a customer to come and order a design or alterations for an article of clothing. On other occasions she is inspired by new designs and creates her own clothing. She also makes sheets and curtains to sell among her customers, family, and friends. Her workshop is in her house, where she equipped a place to work calmly. She has had this business for 11 years and with time she learned to put a good finish on her work. She likes what she does, since she is independent, has her own work schedule, and she also gives other people the opportunity to work, since in certain seasons she hires employees when she has too many orders and she alone can't fill them. She remembers a lot how she started this activity, since she worked for someone else and sought to start her own business and this good decision is reflected now in the income that she earns. She wants to continue with her work and in the future be able to have a bigger workshop with more machines and more workers. 

This is her fourth loan from MFP. She is very thankful to the people who make her loan possible and give her the opportunity to keep working to achieve her goals. She is also committed to making her payments on time with lots of responsibility.

With the sought-after sum, 1000 soles, she will buy materials like thread, needles, buttons, fabric, backing and lace to keep making the clothing and sheets that she sells. She will also buy some equipment what she needs to replace.

loans.use: to buy thread, needles, buttons, fabric, backing, and lace to keep making the clothing and sheets that she sells. She will also buy some equipment that needs replacing.

loans.name: Timothy

texts.en:
Timothy lives in the Kilifi area of Coast province, Kenya.  He is single.  He owns a boutique business that he has been operating for three years.

He learned about Milango through a friend who invited him to the group.  He joined with the aim of accessing credit to improve his business operations.  His main challenge is competition.

Timothy is applying for a loan of 41,900 Kenya Shillings to buy gentleman's and ladies clothing.  Any extra income will be added to his savings to improve his family's standard of living.  He aspires to expand his business by opening another boutique.

loans.use: To buy gentleman's and ladies clothing for resale.

loans.name: Los Pimpollos Group

texts.es:
El Comité "Los Pimpollos" tiene 8 jóvenes, acompañados de sus padres,cada uno de ellos es muy responsable y solidario, tienen ganas de salir adelante, tanto con el grupo como individualmente.
Joel, uno de los integrantes del grupo, se dedica a la cría de chanchos, a los cuales debe engordarlos para luego venderlos es por eso que necesita el dinero para comprar balanceados y mandioca para así alimentar a sus chanchos y luego poder venderlos.
El crédito lo utilizará para comprar alimentos a sus chanchos como balanceados y mandiocas.
texts.en:
The committee, "Los Pimpollos" [The Blossoms or The Sapplings]  is made up of 8 youth, accompanied by their parents. Each one of them is very responsible and supportive. They all have the desire to get ahead, as a group as well as as individuals. 

Joel, one of the group members, makes a living raising pigs, which he fattens in order to later sell. He needs the money from the loan to buy pig feed and yucca, in order to feed his pigs so he will later be able to sell them.

He will use the loan too buy food for his pigs, like feed and yucca.

loans.use: to buy pig feed and yucca to fatten his pigs.

loans.name: Simeona

texts.es:
La socia Simeona tiene 52 años de edad, es casada y fruto de esta relación de unión libre de la cual tiene tres hijos, ella pertenece al banco comunal “Mi Perú” de la Asociación Arariwa y es natural de la ciudad de San Salvador y actualmente vive en la ciudad del Cusco, ella es una madre responsable que saca adelante a sus hijos pues ella se dedica a la venta de granos secos como por ejemplo maíz, quinua, kiwicha, moraya, etc. Ya son quince años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. En esta oportunidad la socia Simeona requiere el préstamo para comprar mercadería como por ejemplo maíz, quinua, chuño, moraya, papa, trigo, cebada, habas y otros granos más. 

La socia Simeona se encuentra agradecida por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en:
Simeona is 52 years old and married. Her common-law relationship resulted in three children. Simeona is a member of the Communal Bank “Mi Perú”, which is part of Asociación Arariwa. She is originally from the city of San Salvador and currently lives in the city of Cusco. Simeona is a responsible mother who helps her children get ahead. She sells dried grains such as corn, quinoa, amaranth, dehydrated potatoes, and other products. Simeona has been in this business for 15 years and has done very well thanks to the effort she puts into her work.

She is taking this opportunity to request a loan in order to buy merchandise such as corn, quinoa, dehydrated potatoes, dried white potatoes, potatoes, wheat, barley, beans, and other grains. Simeona is grateful for this opportunity being given to her in this manner. At the same time, she promises to complete her payments on schedule.

loans.use: to buy corn, quinoa, dehydrated potatoes, dried white potatoes, potatoes, wheat, barley, beans, and other grains.

loans.name: Rosa Arely

texts.es: Rosa Arely de 55 años de edad, es madre soltera de tres hijos los cuales se dedican a estudiar, todo gracias al esfuerzo que Rosa ha hecho por ellos. Ella posee un comedor en el cual elabora desayunos y almuerzos, así mismo vende platillos típicos como pastelitos de carne, yuca frita y otros más. Durante varios años que Rosa ha contado con todo lo necesario gracias a su negocios, trabajando muy duro por sostenerlo y así también para invertir en el, lo que ha sido muy difícil debido a que gran parte de sus ganancias son destinado al sostenimiento de su hogar. Rosa quiere incrementar sus ganancias por lo que solicita un préstamo con el fin de comprar mayor cantidad de materia prima como huevos, arroz, frijoles, carne, vegetales y bebidas, para poder realizar variedad de comidas y así ser preferidas por más personas.
texts.en: Rosa Arely is 55 years old and she is the single mother of three children who are in school, all thanks to efforts Rosa has made for them.  She has a cafeteria where she makes breakfasts and lunches, as well as selling typical dishes such as meat and fried yucca pastries, among other things.  For several years, Rosa has had everything she needs thanks to her business and she has worked very hard to keep it up and invest in it.  This has been very difficult because a large part of her earnings goes to supporting her household.  Rosa wants to increase her earnings, which is why she is asking for a loan to buy greater quantities of raw materials, such as eggs, rice, beans, meat, vegetables, and drinks so she can make a variety of foods and thereby appeal to more people.

loans.use: to buy raw materials to make food

loans.name: Walter Oswaldo

texts.es: Walter de 30 años de edad, él es una persona con muchos sueños y deseos de salir adelante. Walter vive junto a su madre y dos hermanas junto a quienes trabaja para sostener el hogar. Él posee una venta de medicinas populares y naturales, las cuales comercializa en su casa, cuenta con muchos clientes por lo que es un negocio muy rentable para él al que desea aprovecharlo al máximo. Por esta razón Walter solicita un préstamo con la intención de aumentar la cantidad de medicina que posee y de esta forma vender más. Walter desea mucho incrementar el número de clientes que tiene ya que de esta manera mejorará las ganancias con lo que podrá brindarle una ayuda extra a su madre.
texts.en: Walter is 30 years old and is a person with many hopes and dreams of getting ahead.  Walter lives with his mother and two sisters with whom he works  to maintain the home.  He sells common and natural medicines from his home.  He has many customers for it is a profitable business for him, and he would like to take the maximum advantage of that.  For this reason Walter is requesting a loan with the intentions of increasing the quantity of medicines that he has and therefore increase his sales.  Walter would like to increase the number of customers that he has since this will increase his income and he will be able to provide more help to his mother.

loans.use: to purchase medicines for resale.

loans.name: Kesiah

texts.en:
Kesiah is 33 years old, married to Maurice, and blessed with four children aged fifteen, twelve, eight and four. She sells charcoal and firewood, a business she started four years ago and earns a monthly income of KES 30,000. 

She has requested a second loan of KES 40,000 to purchase charcoal and firewood for sale. The profit she earns from it will be ploughed back into her business. 

She hopes to venture into poultry farming alongside this business.

loans.use: To purchase sacks of charcoal  and firewood for sale.

loans.name: Enock

texts.en:
Enock lives in Changamwe area of Coast province, Kenya. He is married and has one school-going child. He owns an audit firm, a business he has been operating for ten years now.

He learnt about Milango through a friend who invited him to the group and he joined with an aim of accessing credit to improve his business operations. The main challenge he is facing is clients defaulting.

Enock is applying for a loan of 83,450 Kenya shillings to acquire office furniture, stationery and related office equipment. His extra income will be added to his savings to pay school fees for his child.

loans.use: To acquire office furniture, stationery and related office equipment.

loans.name: Teresa De Los Ángeles

texts.es: Teresa  de 55 años de edad,  vive junto a su esposo y así mismo junto a 2 hijos menores de edad. Teresa posee una venta cosméticos y productos de belleza como  ganchos cremas para cuerpo y el cabello, esmaltes, perfumes, desodorantes y otros productos más; así también vende medicinas populares, todos sus productos los comercializa de forma ambulante, y haciendo visitas de casa en casa, su venta es bastante estable por lo que desea aumentar sus productos y contar con mayor variedad tanto de productos de belleza como de medicinas. Este negocio es de mucha importancia para ella, es por esta razón que solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, y de esta forma brindarle la ayuda necesaria a su esposo para solventar los gastos del hogar.
texts.en: Fifty-five-year-old Teresa lives with her husband and her two young children.  Teresa has a business selling cosmetics and beauty products, such as hairpins, body and hair creams, nail polish, perfumes, deodorants, and other products.  She also sells traditional medicines.  She sells all of her products on foot and by making house calls.  Her sales are pretty stable, which is why she wants to add more products and have a greater variety of both beauty products and medicines.  This business is very important to her, which is why she is asking INTEGRAL for a loan in order to help her husband with the household expenses.

loans.use: to buy beauty products and medicines to sell

loans.name: Grace

texts.en:
Grace lives in the Mombasa area of Coast province, Kenya. She is married and has one child. She owns an electrical goods shop, a business she has been operating for three years now. She also does embroidery.

She learnt about Milango through a friend who invited her to the group and she joined with an aim of accessing credit to improve her business operations. Her main challenge is scarcity of some products, and the presence of fake goods which offends most clients.

Grace is applying for a loan of 73,100 Kenya shillings to purchase electrical items e.g. cables, sockets, switches etc. The extra income from this loan will be saved to buy a residential house. She aspires to expand and open another business and employ workers.

loans.use: To purchase electrical items e.g., cables, sockets, switches, etc.

loans.name: Pindoty Group

texts.es:
El comité "Pindoty" tiene 12 integrantes, las cuales son muy unidas y trabajadoras todas ellas se esfuerzan día a día por un futuro mejor.
Celia, una de las integrantes del grupo, se dedica a la compra y venta de productos en su despensa, la cual desea surtir aún más para satisfacer mayormente las necesidades de su clientela y generar mayores ingresos para ella y su familia.
Solicita el crédito para la compra de productos como. aceite, arroz, leche, huevo, carne, etc.
texts.en:
The Pindoty Communal Bank has 12 members who are very close and hardworking.  They all put in their best efforts day after day to have a better future.  

Celia, one of the group members, buys and sells products in her food store, which she wants to stock even more so that she can meet more of her clientele's needs and generate more income for herself and her family.

She is asking for this loan to buy products such as oil, rice, milk, eggs, meat, etc.

loans.use: to buy bread, oil, rice, cheese, milk, toilet paper, etc.

loans.name: Aminata

texts.en:
This is 28-year-old Aminata.  She is married and has two children, ages four and nine.  In 1999, Aminata established her plastic products business, selling slippers and sandals.  The money from her business started to help her husband run their home and be self-sustainable.  

Working seven days a week and 10 hours a day, she earns about Le 1,730,000 each month from this business.  She would like a loan in the amount of Le 4,500,000.  Aminata has already received and successfully repaid two loans, and now requires a new loan in order to buy additional plastic slippers.  She hopes that this loan will enable her to increase her monthly profits by approximately Le 778,500.  In the future, Aminata plans to improve her business and expand to a shop.  She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to buy plastic shoes for resale.

loans.name: Mujeres Unidas. Group

texts.es:
El Comité "Mujeres Unidas." tiene 10 integrantes, las cuales se esfuerzan en distintas actividades para salir adelante tanto individualmente como grupalmnente.
La sra. Julia, una de las integrantes del grupo se dedica a su despensa, compra y venta de productos para el hogar, con este trabajo ella mantiene a su familia, su ideal es tener mas variedades de productos que ofrecer a su clientela y agrandar su negocio.
Solicita el crédito para la compra de productos varios: aceites, arroz, leches, carnes, huevos, etc. productos que podrá ofrecer a su clientela y así satisfacer las necesidades de éstos y generar mayores ingresos para sí.
texts.en:
The group "Mujeres Unidas" ("United Women") has 10 members who work at various activities to get ahead individually as much as a the group.
Mrs. Julia, one of the members, works in her store, buying and reselling products for the home.  With this work she supports her family.  Her goal is to have a bigger variety of products to offer to her customers and grow her business.
She is requesting this loan to purchase various products: oils, rice, milk, meats, eggs, etc..  These are products that she will be able to offer to her customers thus satisfying their needs and generating more income for herself.

loans.use: Comprar aceites, leches, huevos, carnes, etc.

loans.name: Charles

texts.en:
Charles lives in the Changamwe area of Coast province, Kenya. He is married and has one child. He owns a tailoring shop, a business he has been operating for one and a half years now. He also sells assorted retail items like spoons, cups, basins etc.

He learnt about Milango through a friend who invited him to the group and he joined with an aim of accessing credit to improve his business operations. His main challenge is customers who delay to collect their clothes, letting the work pile up.

Charles is applying for a loan of 21,100 Kenya shillings to buy materials, sewing thread and pins. His extra income will be added to his savings to improve the living standard of his family. He aspires to expand and open some two more tailor shops and employ workers.

loans.use: To buy materials, sewing thread and pins.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy items for the salon like hair driers and a blow-dry machine.

loans.name: Carlos

texts.es:
El sr. Carlos se dedica a la compra y venta de mercaderías en su despensa y copetín; con este trabajo el logra sacar adelante a su familia.
Carlos desea satisfacer aún más las necesidades y comodidades de su clientela es por eso que solicita el crédito, y así también generar mayores ingresos.
Solicita el crédito para comprar mercaderías como: aceite, leche, huevo, frutas, verduras, bebidas, etc.
texts.en:
Mr. Carlos makes a living selling merchandise in his snack store.  With this work he is getting his family ahead.
Carlos wishes to better satisfy the needs and comforts of his customers and for this reason he is requesting this loan.  He will also generate more income.
He is requesting the loan to purchase merchandise sch as: milk, eggs, oil, fruits, vegetable, beverages, etc..

loans.use: to purchase merchandise: milk, eggs, oil, fruits, vegetable, beverages, etc..

loans.name: Hector

texts.es: El Sr. Héctor de 50 años de edad es casado y tiene tres personas que dependen económicamente de él. Héctor trabaja en una refaccionaria desempeñándose como gerente puesto que se ha ganado a base de esfuerzo, es un hombre de familia siempre buscando y procurando lo mejor para sus hijos. En esta ocasión Héctor pide de nuestra ayuda para gastos escolares como inscripciones, la compra de materiales y uniformes. El sabe que sus hijos se merecen lo mejor es por eso que ha tratado siempre de brindarles lo que ellos necesitan. El agradecerá la ayuda que se pueda brindar.
texts.en:
Sr. Héctor is 50 years old, married, and has three financial dependents. He works hard at his job as a manager at an auto repair shop. Héctor is a family man who is always looking for ways to provide the best for his children.

On this occasion, Héctor is requesting assistance with school expenses such as registration fees, materials, and uniforms. He knows that his children deserve the best, so he always tries to provide what they need. Héctor appreciates the help that is being given.

loans.use: to pay for his children's school expenses such as registration fees, materials, and uniforms.

loans.name: Addah

texts.en:
Addah lives in the Mombasa area of Coast province, Kenya. She is single. She owns a clothes business where she sells second-hand clothes, a business she has been operating for two years now. Besides this business, Addah is also employed.

She learnt about Milango through a friend who invited her to the group and she joined with an aim of accessing credit to improve her business operations. Her main challenge is competition.

Addah is applying a loan of 31,500 Kenya shillings to purchase additional stock of second-hand clothes. Her extra income will be added to her savings to improve her living standard. She aspires to expand and open another business.

loans.use: To purchase additional stock of second-hand clothes.

loans.name: Hernando

texts.es:
Hernando trabaja desde que era muy joven, pues proviene de una familia de escasos recursos económicos y por las necesidades que surgían comenzó a trabajar vendiendo comidas rápidas en su municipio. Allí trabajó durante un tiempo de modo que aportaba a sus padres para que en su hogar tuvieran la posibilidad de tener una mejor calidad de vida y mejores oportunidades económicas, pero debido a problemas de violencia se vio en la obligación de salir de su municipio como desplazado y llegó a la ciudad en busca de oportunidades económicas para progresar. Fue así como comenzó a vender frutas y verduras y con este negocio comenzó a ganarse la vida. Actualmente Hernando tiene un hijo a quien le brinda el acceso a una educación de buena calidad y por quien tiene todas las obligaciones, pues su madre los abandonó hace un tiempo. Gracias a que ha tenido muy buenas ventas, la situación económica del hogar ha venido mejorando, y por esto también busca un préstamo para comprar verduras que se han agotado en su negocio.

Su mayor sueño es brindar a su hijo una mejor calidad de vida y la oportunidad de acceder a una universidad. Además, tiene el sueño de en un futuro comprar su casa propia.
texts.en:
Hernando has worked since he was very young, as he comes from a family with very little money and when the need came up, he started work selling fast food in his municipality.  He worked there for a while, bringing money home to his parents so they could have a chance at a better quality of life and better financial opportunities.  However, because of problems with violence, he had to leave his municipality as an outcast and he came to the city looking for opportunities to get ahead financially.  This is how he began selling fruit and vegetables and, with this business, he began to earn his living.  Currently, Hernando has a son he provides with a good education and for whom he is completely responsible, as the mother abandoned them some time ago.  Thanks to his good sales, his financial situation at home has been improving, which is why he is asking for a loan to buy the vegetables that he has run out of at his business.

His greatest dream is to offer his son a better quality of life and the opportunity to attend a university.  He also dreams of buying his own home in the future.

loans.use: to buy the vegetables he has run out of at his business

loans.name: Kashi

texts.en:
Kashi lives in the Mombasa area of Coast province, Kenya. She is married and has two children; both of whom attend school. She owns a food cafe which she has been operating for two and a half years now. The café sells tea. Kashi also owns butchery besides being employed.

She learnt about Milango through a friend who invited her to the group and she joined with an aim of accessing credit to improve her business operations.

Kashi is applying for a loan of 62,650 Kenya shillings to purchase food stock, e.g., flour, sugar, fish and meat. Her extra income will go toward improving the living standard of her family. She aspires to expand and open up a big restaurant in the area.

loans.use: To purchase food stock, e.g., flour, sugar, fish and meat.

loans.name: Marvin Geovany

texts.es: Marvin de 28 años de edad, vive en una aldea del municipio de San Pedro Sula junto a su esposa y su hijo.  Hace 5 años que Marvin se dedica a su propio negocio de comprar y vender frutas de temporada y verduras. El compra directamente a los agricultores la producción de temporada y la vende en los mercados de la ciudad. Ya tiene sus clientes fijos. El solicita un préstamo por 12,000.00 lempiras para comprar frutas y verduras para la venta y una parte la utilizara para reparar el vehículo de trabajo. Con esta inversión espera seguir trabajando. Pues su meta es hacerle mejoras a su vivienda, ampliar su mercado de ventas y tener una solvencia económica junto a su familia.
texts.en:
Marvin, age 28, lives in a neighborhood in the town of San Pedro Sula along with his wife and child. For the past five years, Marvin has managed his own business of buying and selling seasonal fruits and vegetables. He buys directly from the seasonal agricultural producers and then sells his products at the markets in the city. Marvin already has established customers.

He is requesting a loan of 12,000 HNL in order to buy fruits and vegetables to sell. Part of the loan will also be used to repair the vehicle he uses for work. With this investment, he hopes to continue working. Marvin’s goals include making improvements to his home, expanding his sales market, and establishing financial solvency for his family.

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables in bulk and to pay for repairs to his work vehicle.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cigarettes, provisions, soap, padlocks and candles.

loans.name: Idalith Marcela

texts.es:
Idalith Marcela es estudiante de Administración en salud, va a ingresar a segundo semestre. Idalith vive con sus padres y hermana menor en uno de los barrios con menores recursos de Bogotá - Colombia; su madre está desempleada y enferma; su padre trabaja en carpintería.  Son una familia muy unida que buscan mejorar su calidad de vida para un mejor futuro.  

La siguiente es su historia:

Mi nombre es Idalith Marcela y vivo con mis padres y hermana, mi madre por cosas del destino se encuentra desempleada y mi padre trabaja duramente como ebanista, siempre hemos sido una familia la cual ha luchado por tener un futuro mejor, y por eso me encuentro estudiando un auxiliar administrativo en salud, con la esperanza de conseguir un mejor empleo, para así recompensar a mis padres , para que no sigan trabajando pues ya es hora que descansen y yo como hija les de todo el amor y gratitud que merecen, pues mi madre ya está cansada y le duelen mucho sus piernas aunque me encuentro trabajando a veces el es complicado cumplir con mis obligaciones, pero he sido una persona que lucha por su sueños, y quiere un futuro mejor no solo para mí sino para mi familia. Me considero una persona inteligente que puede aportar nuevas ideas para mi propio desarrollo y el de una institución.
texts.en:
Idalith Marcela is studying health administration, and she is going to enter into her second semester.  Idalith lives with her parents and younger sister in one of the neighborhoods that has few resources in Bogotá – Colombia.  Her mother is an unemployed nurse.  Her father works in carpentry.   They are a very close family that is looking to improve their quality of life for a better future.

The following is her story:

My name is Idalith Marcela. I live with my parents and my sister.  My mother, as fate would have it, is unemployed.  My father works hard as a cabinetmaker.  We have always been a family that struggles to have a better future.

That is why I am studying to be an assistant in health administration.  I do this with the hope of getting better employment in order to repay my parents.  This is so that they do not keep working, because it is time that they rest.  I, as their daughter, give them all of the love and gratitude that they deserve.  My mother is now tired, and her legs hurt a lot.  Even though I am working, it is sometimes difficult to complete my obligations.

I have been a person who is tenacious about my dream, and I want a better future, not only for me, but for my family.  I consider myself to be an intelligent person who can contribute new ideas for my own growth and for that of an institution.

loans.use: to study her second semester of health administration.

loans.name: Erika Andrea

texts.es:
Erika Andrea desde pequeña tuvo muchos inconvenientes para salir adelante, siempre tuvo que subsistir por sus propios medios, fue madre muy joven sin embargo sus ganas de progresar con dos niños le permitió terminar sus estudios de bachiller.

En 2006 logro terminar sus estudios de enfermería ya que ella ama la salud y le encanta ayudar a los demás y ella cree que la mejor forma de hacerlo es especializarse más en esta área es por esto que quiere continuar con sus estudios en administración en salud para de esta forma de esta forma ubicarse laboralmente para que sus hijos puedan tener un gran futuro y puedan realizar una carrera universitaria también

La siguiente es la historia de Erika Andrea en sus propias palabras:

Hola, mi nombre es Erika Andrea; tengo 38 años de edad, soy casada hace 19 años y tengo dos hijitos, un hombrecito de 18 años y una niñita de 15, vivimos con mi esposo que tiene 42 años.

Siempre he vivido en Bogotá, mi mamá se fue para Venezuela cuando yo tenía dos años y desde entonces viví con mi abuela materna, a mi familia paterna nunca la conocí.  Siempre tuvimos muchos problemas económicos, mi abuela cuando pudo, me dio el estudio y lo que necesite hasta que cuando yo tenía 17 años ella murió de cáncer de estomago... Luego de esto, mi vida dio un vuelco terrible, perdí el año escolar y debido a esto perdí el cupo en el colegio. 

En 2006 logre terminar mis estudios de enfermería que es una profesión que amo con el corazón, puesto que me encanta ayudar a los demás y que mejor que cuidando su salud.  Cuando me gradué como Auxiliar en Enfermería, recibí la medalla al mérito por mi esfuerzo y mis buenas calificaciones; aunque debido a los cuidados, las citas, las cirugías de la niña y algunos problemas de salud míos, no pude ejercer mi profesión.  Un día decidí que ahora que mis hijos están más grandecitos, puedo seguir con lo que más me gusta en la vida... mi profesión. 

Hace seis meses entre a estudiar Administración en Salud en Campoalto, me ha ido muy bien... pero mi esposo se quedo sin trabajo durante ocho meses, mi hijo está en la universidad y aunque mi esposo hizo todo lo posible por colaborarme y ya consiguió trabajo, las deudas que nos quedaron son muy grandes.  Yo quiero, deseo seguir estudiando, creo que es una deuda conmigo misma, que ya es el momento de poder desarrollarme laboralmente, para así también poder ayudarle a mi esposo económicamente, ya que debido a que no pude ejercer mi carrera y han pasado cinco años en los que no he conseguido experiencia laboral, nadie me contrata... Así que por favor les pido de corazón que me ayuden a lograr este sueño... para poder ayudar a mi esposo con el pago de las deudas y con los gastos que se vienen, ya que mi hija está próxima a terminar su bachillerato y me haría muy feliz que pueda entrar a la universidad. De todo corazón agradezco por la ayuda que puedan prestarme.
 
Dios los Bendiga.
texts.en:
Ever since she was little Erika Andrea has had many obstacles to getting ahead.  She always had to support herself by her own means.  She became a mother when she was very young.  Nevertheless, her desire to get ahead with two children allowed her to finish high school.  At one time she was somewhat ill, and she very depressed.  However, her children, the driving force of her life, gave her a lot of strength.

In 2006 she managed to complete her nursing studies.  She loves the health field, and is delighted helping others.  She believes that the best way to do so is to specialize more in this area.  That is why she wants to continue with her studies in health administration.  This way she will get employment so that her children are able to have a great future and a university degree as well.

The following is Erika Andrea’s story in her own words:

Hi, my name is Erika Andrea.  I am 38 years old, and I have been married for 19 years.  I have two children, an 18 year old boy and a 15 year old girl.  We live with my 42 year old husband.

I have always lived in Bogotá.  My mother left for Venezuela when I was two years old.   From then on I lived with my maternal grandmother.  I never knew my paternal family.   It should be noted that my father rarely, well, never lived with me.  We always had a lot of financial problems.  My grandmother, when she could, gave me an education and what I needed.  Then, one day, when I was 17, she died of stomach cancer.

After this my life took a terrible turn.  My aunt and uncle threw me out of the house.  I lost a year of school (I was in the tenth grade at this time), and because of this I lost my place at the school.  At this time I had a friend who supported me and helped me a lot.  He proposed that we live together.   Because of my situation and what I earned Saturdays and Sundays and when I was not in school, which was not enough for anything, I decided to accept.

In 2006 I managed to finish my nursing studies.  It is a profession that I love with all of my heart.  Given that I love helping others, there is nothing better than taking care of their health.

When I graduated as a nursing assistant I received the medal of merit for my effort and my good grades.  Even though I could not exercise my profession due to the care, the appointments, my daughter’s surgeries, and some of my own health problems (after the cancer was controlled they diagnosed me with endometriosis), one day I decided that now that my children are big I can continue with what I like most in my life…my profession.

Six months ago I started studying health administration at Campoalto.  It has been going very well for me….however, my husband was left without work for eight months and my son is at the university.  Even though my husband did everything possible to help me, and he found work, the debts that we have are very large.

I want and I wish to continue studying.  I think I owe it to myself.  This is the time to be able to grow in relation to work.  This way I can also be able to help my husband financially.  Because I was not able to practice my career, and it has been five years since I have had work experience, nobody hires me.

That is why I am asking you, please, from my heart, help me accomplish my dream.  This is in order to be able to help my husband pay our debts and the expenses that are coming.  My daughter is close to finishing high school, and it would make me very happy for her to go to the university.  From the bottom of my heart I thank you for the help that you are able to lend me.

God bless you.

loans.use: to study the second semester of health administration.

loans.name: Djaano Group

texts.en:
Djaano is a group made up of two women who are 46 years and 56 years old. One of them is married with two children and other one is single. They sell vegetables and fish. They meet on Tuesdays to discuss about their business. They live in the same neighborhood. 

Felicia is 46 years old  and she sells vegetables and fish. She is married to a mason who is 44 years and has two children. This is her 5th loan cycle with ID-Ghana. She was given a loan amount of 600 Ghana cedis and finished paying on July 24, 2012. She buys her items from the wholesale market and sells at her residence in Teshie. Her monthly profit is 100 Ghana cedis of which she uses part to assist her husband and part for reinvestment.

They need a total amount of 1,400 Ghana cedis.

loans.use: To buy more vegetables and fish  to sell to customers.

loans.name: Miriam

texts.es:
Miriam es una persona muy trabajadora y emprendedora que a pesar de las derrotas que le ha dado la vida, ha seguido adelante luchando para sacar adelante a su familia. Anteriormente trabajaba en una empresa familiar junto con sus padres donde confeccionaba calzado, pero debido a condiciones económicas y las dificultades del contrabando, su empresa quebró por no poder hacerle frente a los precios de la competencia. En este momento, al ver la necesidad de generar los ingresos que requería en su hogar para contribuir junto con su esposo a sostener a sus 2 hijos, Miriam decidió comenzar su propio taller de confección a terceros y así salió adelante. Hace unos 12 años que comenzó con su propio taller y gracias a la buena calidad de sus productos ha logrado salir adelante brindándoles a sus hijos y su esposo una buena calidad de vida en su hogar. Gracias a que durante un tiempo estaba confeccionando una línea propia de pijamas, una cliente ha tomado un gran pedido de estas referencias; pero como no cuenta con el capital suficiente para responder por ellos, Miriam busca un préstamo que le permita comprar insumos como telas e hilos y producir el pedido de pijamas que ha hecho su cliente.

Su sueño es salir adelante con este negocio y que este le permita seguir sacando adelante a su familia, brindándoles una buena educación y mayores posibilidades económicas para progresar.
texts.en:
Miriam is a very hardworking and enterprising person who has kept on working to get her family ahead in spite of the defeats life has dealt her.  She used to work in a family business with her parents where they made shoes, but because of economic circumstances and problems with contraband, their business went under because they could not compete with their competitors' prices.  At that time, faced with the need to generate the income her household needed and to contribute along with her husband to supporting their two children, Miriam decided to start her own sewing studio through a third party and that is how she got ahead.  She started her studio twelve years ago and, thanks to the good quality of her products, she has been able to get ahead and offer her children and her husband a good quality of life at home.  For a while now she has been sewing her own line of pajamas and one of her customers has placed a huge order for them.  However, as she does not have enough capital to fill the order, Miriam is asking for a loan to buy supplies, such as fabrics and thread so that she can fill her customer's order for pajamas.

Her dream is for her business to be successful and for it allow her to keep getting her family ahead so she can offer them a good education and better financial opportunities to make progress.

loans.use: to buy supplies such as fabrics and thread to fill her customer's order for pajamas.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for kitchen utensils for resale.

loans.name: Sandra Patricia

texts.es:
Sandra tiene 2 hijos de 15 y 19 años de edad, y para generar los ingresos que requiere en su hogar para el sostenimiento de sus hijos tiene 3 vacas lecheras que le producen la leche diaria que vende en su municipio. La actividad la aprendió de sus padres que siempre se dedicaron a esta actividad y gracias a esto desde muy joven aprendió a trabajar a su lado, por esto ahora tiene una gran experiencia que le permite ofrecer a sus clientes un producto de muy buena calidad. Gracias a que las ventas de su negocio han venido creciendo, las dificultades económicas en su hogar han venido mejorando considerablemente, sin embargo aún desea poder ofrecer a su hijo mayor el acceso a una educación universitaria y para esto requiere de mayores ingresos. Afortunadamente ha venido teniendo muy buenos pedidos y con el ánimo de responder a los grandes pedidos busca un préstamo para comprar una vaca lechera y tener la capacidad de producción para responder a los pedidos de sus clientes.

Su mayor sueño es lograr que sus hijos puedan acceder a una educación universitaria y salgan adelante. También sueña con que en un futuro pueda tener su casa propia y así gozar de un hogar más estable.
texts.en:
Sandra has two children, ages 15 and 19.  In order to generate income, which she needs in her household to support her two children, she has three dairy cows.  They produce milk daily that she sells in her municipality.  She learned this business activity from who parents, who also devoted themselves to this work.  Thanks to this she learned to work at their side when she was very young.

Therefore, she has a lot of experience that allows her to offer her customers a very good quality product.  Thanks to the growing sales in her business, the financial difficulties in her household have been improving considerably.  Nevertheless, she still wishes to be able to offer her oldest child access to a university education.  To do so she needs greater income.

Fortunately, she has been getting very good orders.  With the intent of responding to the large orders, she is looking for a loan to buy a dairy cow.  She will then have the production capacity to respond to her customers’ orders.

Her biggest dream is to manage for her children to have access to a university education, and that they get ahead.  She also dreams of, in the future, being able to have her own house and enjoying a more stable home life.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow in order to have the production capacity to respond to her customers’ orders.

loans.name: Flora

texts.es: Flora de 58 años de edad, es una señora que ha trabajado muy duro por contar con una vida estable, ella vive junto a su esposo quien es pensionado por lo que le ayuda a Flor a atender el negocio.  Ella posee una tortillería donde se encarga de elaborar las tortillas que comercializa en su  casa, así también cuenta con una tienda de productos perecederos donde vende productos como: granos básicos, leche, pan, detergentes y otros más. Para Flor sus negocios son muy importantes porque son la mayor fuente de ingresos que posee, por lo que solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, por medio del cual pueda contar con el dinero necesario para invertir más en la tienda, surtiéndola de productos nuevos como bebidas, productos lácteos y otros más, así también desea comprar maíz por mayor para elaborar más tortillas, con lo que podrá vender más productos.
texts.en:
Flora is 58 years old, and is a woman who has worked very hard her whole life to make a living. She lives with her husband, who presently receives a pension, and who also helps Flora tend to her store. She operates a tortilla shop where she makes and sells tortillas from her home. She also has a small convenience store there, too, where she sells a wide variety of products, including: staple grains, bread, milk, detergents and other items.

As the primary source of income for her family, Flora's business is very important to her. She is requesting this loan from INTEGRAL in order to further invest in her business and offer a wider variety of products to her customers, such as drinks, dairy products, etc. She also plans to use support from this loan to purchase corn for making tortillas, which will hopefully increase her output potential and her profits.

loans.use: to purchase corn for making tortillas, as well as perishable items for her convenience store.

loans.name: Raúl Oswaldo

texts.es:
Raúl anteriormente trabajaba en una floristería, y debido a dificultades de la empresa se quedó sin trabajo. Para comenzar a generar los ingresos que requería en su hogar tuvo la alternativa de comenzar a vender el gas en las viviendas de su municipio y las veredas cercanas, y desde hace 5 años esta es la fuente de ingresos para su hogar donde convive con su esposa y su hijo de 9 años. Para transportar el gas Raúl cuenta con una moto que le permite realizar todas las entregas en las veredas y municipios, pero debido a que se encuentra averiada sus ingresos se han visto gravemente afectados. Para arreglarla, Raúl busca un préstamo para reparar la moto con la que realiza la distribución del gas y poder seguir generando los ingresos para su hogar. 

Su sueño es que su hijo pueda salir adelante y para esto espera brindarle una educación de buena calidad. Además, aspira a que en su hogar puedan contar con una mejor calidad de vida y mejores oportunidades económicas para progresar.
texts.en:
Raúl used to work in a flower shop, but because of problems in the business he was left without a job.  In order to generate the income his household needed, he took the option of selling gas to homes in his municipality and the surrounding district.  For five years, this has been the source of income for his household, which includes his wife and his nine-year-old son.  Raúl uses a motorcycle to transport the gas that allows him to complete all of his deliveries in town and in the surrounding areas.  However, the motorcycle is broken and his income has been seriously affected.  Raúl is asking for a loan to fix the motorcycle that he uses to deliver gas so he will be able to keep generating income for his household.  

His dream is for his son to get ahead and, in order for this to happen, he hopes to offer him a good education.  He also aspires to a better quality of life and better financial opportunities to get ahead for his household.

loans.use: to repair the motorcycle he uses to deliver gas so he can keep generating income for his household

loans.name: Claudia

texts.es:
Claudia se encuentra casada y tiene 2 hijos de 4 y 13 años de edad, y debido a los ingresos que generaba su esposo no estaban siendo suficientes para poder tener una buena calidad de vida en su hogar, decidió montar su propio negocio con el cual pudiera apoyar económicamente en su hogar y permitir que sus 2 hijos pudieran tener una mejor calidad de vida y las dificultades económicas de ella y su esposo pudieran ser superadas. Fue así como comenzó vendiendo algunas verduras y poco a poco ha venido creciendo hasta ahora tener una tienda general donde ofrece productos de la canasta familiar a sus clientes. La situación económica en su hogar ha venido mejorando y espera que su hijo mayor pueda seguir accediendo a una educación de buena calidad y que su hijo menor que pronto ingresará a estudiar también lo pueda hacer. Claudia busca un préstamo para comprar productos de la canasta familiar y surtir su tienda de algunos productos que ya se han ido agotando.

Su sueño es que esta tienda salga adelante y sus hijos y su esposo tengan la oportunidad de tener una mejor calidad de vida y mayores oportunidades económicas para progresar.
texts.en:
Claudia is married and has two children, 4 and 13 years old.  Since her husband did not earn enough to provide a good quality of life in their home, Claudia decided to start her own business which would help her household financially and enable her two children to have a better quality of life and her and her husband to overcome their economic difficulties. That was why she began selling a few vegetables and then gradually grew until now she has a general store where she offers a range of essential products to her customers.

The financial situation of her home has been improving and she expects her older son to be able to continue having a good quality education and that her younger son, who is about to start school, will also be able to have one. Claudia is requesting a loan to purchase basic household supplies and to stock her store with some products that have sold out.

Her dream is that this store will move forward and that her sons and husband will have the opportunity to have a better quality of life and more opportunities to succeed.

loans.use: to purchase basic household supplies and stock her store with several products that have sold out.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase some maize flour and cereals.

loans.name: Maria De Las Mercedes

texts.es:
Maria es una persona que siempre se ha caracterizado por ser muy trabajadora, y esto le ha permitido superar grandes dificultades que se le han presentado en la vida. Ella se encuentra casada y tiene 2 hijos a quienes siempre les ha querido brindar el acceso a una educación de buena calidad, y es por esto que un día decidió montar su propio negocio para contribuir económicamente junto con su esposo para que la calidad de vida en su hogar mejorara considerablemente. Fue así como nació su fábrica de arepas que a pesar de no haber sido montada con un gran capital, si ha logrado salir adelante gracias al gran esfuerzo que hace diariamente Maria en ofrecer a sus clientes productos de buena calidad. Desde que montó su negocio, las dificultades económicas en su hogar han venido siendo superadas poco a poco y cada vez en su hogar pueden gozar de una mejor calidad de vida, sin embargo aún tienen problemas económicos y por esto trabaja fuertemente todos los días para salir adelante. Buscando mejorar la calidad de su producción, Maria busca un préstamo para realizar reformas locativas a su sitio de trabajo y poder fabricar las arepas a gas y no más a leña.

Su sueño es sacar este negocio adelante y que le permita seguir ofreciendo en su hogar una buena calidad de vida a su esposo y sus 2 hijos. Además sueña con que este negocio crezca y pueda generar empleo para las personas más necesitadas.
texts.en:
Maria is a person that has always been very hard working and this has made her able to overcome difficulties that she has faced in her life.  She is married and has 2 children to which she has always wanted to provide a good quality education.  Because of this she decided to start her own business, to financially help her husband to improve the quality of life in their home.  In this way her business of making arepas ( a form of corn tortilla) was born, and even though it was not started with a lot of capital it has grown thanks to all the hard work that she puts in every day to offer her customers good quality products.  Since she has started her business, the financial difficulties in her home are been slowly being overcome and they can enjoy a better quality of life. She still has financial  problems, however,  and continues to work very hard to get ahead.  Trying to improve the quality of her production, Maria is requesting a loan to make improvements to her place of business and be able to make the arepas using gas instead of wood.

Her dream is to grow this business and continue providing a better quality of life to her husband and 2 children.  And she also wishes that this business grow and provides employment to people that need it.

loans.use: to make structural changes to her work place and be able to make arepas burning gas and not wood.

loans.name: Mwanaisha

texts.en:
Mwanaisha lives in the Malindi area of Coast Province, Kenya. She has three children. She owns a water business, a business which she has been operating for two years. In an attempt to increase her level of income, she hopes to start a grocery stall.

She learnt about Milango through friends who invited her to the group and she joined with the aim of accessing credit to improve her business operations. Her main challenge is customers not paying on time.

Mwanaisha is applying for a loan of 21,100 Kenya shillings to purchase a new stock of grocery items. Her extra income from the loan will be added to her savings to increase her savings. Her dream is to open a green grocer shop and develop it and live a stable life.

loans.use: To purchase a new stock of grocery items.

loans.name: Luz Marleny

texts.es:
Luz Marleny hace poco se separó del padre de sus 3 hijos y desde entonces es madre soltera cabeza de hogar a cargo de sus hijos y sin contar con el apoyo de nadie, es por esto que ha venido trabajando fuertemente para superar las dificultades económicas que esto trae y poderles brindar una buena calidad de vida a sus hijos. Anteriormente trabajaba en una empresa, pero debido a que tenía que estar al cuidado de sus hijos, decidió renunciar y con el dinero de la liquidación montó una legumbrería en un local muy cerca de su casa y así puede estar atendiendo el negocio para generar ingresos y también estar al cuidado de sus hijos. Han sido una gran cantidad de dificultades que se le han presentado, pero siempre ha mantenido la misma esperanza de que podrá salir adelante y sus hijos podrán tener una mejor calidad de vida. Buscando mejorar cada vez más su negocio para aumentar sus ventas, Luz Marleny busca un préstamo para comprar un enfriador, un aviso para su negocio, una gramera y surtir su negocio con más frutas y verduras.

Su sueño es que este negocio salga adelante y le permita sacar a sus hijos adelante brindándoles una buena calidad de vida y el acceso a una educación de buena calidad.
texts.en:
Luz Marleny recently separated from the father of her three children and since then she has been a single mother. As head of household she is supporting her children without relying on help from anyone. Therefore she has been working hard to overcome the economic difficulties this situation presemts so that she can provide a good quality of life for her children.

Formerly she was working for a company but because she had to care for her children she decided to resign and use the severance pay to start a vegetable store in a space very near her house so that she can run her business and make a living and also be available to her children. She has confronted a great many difficulties, however she has always held on to the hope that she will be able to get ahead and that her children will be able to have a better quality of life.

Looking to improve her business and increase sales, Luz Marlene is requesting a loan to purchase a cooler, an ad for her business, a scale and to stock her business with more fruits and vegetables.

Her dream is that this business will succeed and enable her to move her children forward by giving them a good quality of life and access to a good quality education.

loans.use: to purchase a cooler, an ad for her business, a scale and to stock her store with more fruits and vegetables.

loans.name: Dario De Jesus

texts.es:
Dario trabajó durante mucho tiempo la actividad de la agricultura, pero debido a problemas de salud que le generaba esta actividad, se vio en la obligación de dejarla a un lado. Sin embargo, dada la necesidad de generar ingresos para poder sostener su hogar donde convive con su esposa y sus 3 hijos, decidió montar una tienda donde vende licor a sus clientes; gracias a este negocio ha seguido generando ingresos para poder sostener su familia y así no afecta sus problemas de salud. A pesar de que cuando comenzó su negocio lo hizo con muy bajo capital, Dario ha venido trabajando fuertemente para sacar su negocio adelante y esto ha permitido que la calidad de vida en su hogar mejore cada vez más. Buscando superar la dificultad de capital que tiene, Dario busca un préstamo para comprar licores y surtir su negocio de las bebidas que ya se han ido agotando.

Su sueño es seguir con este negocio hasta que su salud se lo permita y gracias a este poder sacar sus 3 hijos adelante brindándoles una educación de buena calidad.
texts.en:
Dario worked for a long time as a farmer, however due to health problems stemming from this work, he was obligated to leave it aside. Nevertheless, given the need to generate an income to support his home, where he lives with his wife and three children, he decided to start a store where he sells liquor to his customers. Thanks to this business he has continued generating earnings to support his family without affecting his health. Although when he started his business, he did so with very little capital, Dario has been working very hard to move his business forward and this has allowed the quality of life in his home to improve more and more. Looking to overcome the problem of lack of capital, Dario is requesting a loan to purchase liquor and stock his business with inventory which has been sold out.

His dream is to continue with this business as long as his health permits and thanks to this he will be able to move his three children forward by providing them with a good quality education.

loans.use: to buy liquor and stock his business with drinks, which have sold out.

loans.name: Aziza

texts.en:
Aziza lives in the Malindi area in Coast Province, Kenya. She has two children.

She owns a water business, which she has been operating for three years. She learned about Milango through friends who invited her to the group, and she ultimately joined with the aim of accessing credit to improve her business operations. Her main challenge is the lack of storage facilities during water shortages.

Aziza is applying for a loan in the amount of 21,050 KES to buy water tanks. Any extra income generated from the loan will be added to her savings to pay school fees for her children. Her dream is to build and open a water reservoir that will contain about 100,000 litres of water.

loans.use: To purchase additional water tanks.

loans.name: Victoire Josette

texts.fr: Victoire Josette est âgée de 51 ans et est mariée à un certain Aziz. Victoire Josette n'a pas d'enfant à charge. Victoire Josette assure ensemble avec son mari, les divers besoins du ménage. Pour contribuer à ses différents besoins, Victoire Josette vend depuis une vingtaine d’année, des canaris et des fourneaux par le système de distribution. Cette activité lui permet de répondre sans grande difficulté à ses besoins. Victoire Josette s’approvisionne dans une région du Bénin. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour accroître son chiffre d’affaires et son revenu, Victoire Josette sollicite pour la quatrième fois, un crédit auprès de ALIDé. Ce prêt lui permettra de rehausser le niveau de son activité et d’accroître sa clientèle et son revenu.
texts.en: Victoire Josette is 51 years old and married to a man named Aziz.  She has no children in her care, and shares the various household expenses with her husband.  To meet her needs, for the last twenty years Josette has been selling pottery water containers and stoves through a distribution system.  This business allows her to meet her needs without much difficulty.  Victoire Josette buys her products in a region of Benin.  In order to satisfy her customers and increase her sales figures, Victoire Josette is requesting her fourth loan through ALIDé.  This loan will allow her to augment her business activity to increase her clientele and her income.

loans.use: to buy pottery water containers.

loans.name: Rajmonda

texts.en:
Rajmonda is an Egyptian woman in her forties. She is divorced, and she has four children ranging in age from 9 to 24 years old. Her youngest child is still attending school. She does not receive any support -- financially or emotionally -- from her ex-husband. As a result, she explains that she is basically on her own, and that she and her children have had a difficult few years.

Despite the difficulties Rajmonda has been having, she started selling used clothes in an attempt to improve her family's living conditions. “I don’t make much, yet with whatever I make I can feed my children,” Rajmonda said with tears in her eyes.

She is now requesting a loan from Kiva to buy used clothes. She is extremely appreciative of lenders' support and kindness.

loans.use: To purchase additional used clothes

loans.name: Ofir

texts.es: Ofir de 39 años de edad es la propietaria de un café internet, donde ofrece servicios de comunicación que incluye telefonía celular por minutos, llamadas telefónicas locales nacionales e internacionales, fotocopiaje y venta de confitería. Este negocio inició hace 7 años vendiendo minutos en la terraza de su casa, con un par de celulares prestados  y poco a poco y con el apoyo de su madre y mucha disciplina, ha ido agregando otros servicios como el de fotocopiaje, internet y dulcería. Hoy cuenta con 5 computadores, un local en calidad de arrendamiento, 9 planes a celulares, fotocopiadoras, servicios de recargas y una muy alta demanda de su oferta. Sus instalaciones dan apertura al público desde las 7 de la mañana, hasta las 9 de la noche y de lunes a domingos. Las compras de sus insumos las realiza de contado y paga las facturas de comunicaciones mensualmente; sus principales clientes son sus vecinos estudiantes de colegios cercanos, transeúntes y visitantes del barrio, los cuales son turistas que van a degustar los deliciosos platos marinos en estaderos cercanos. Su credikiva es el segundo crédito que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprara insumos como papel, tintas y un surtido de la confitería que a sus clientes les gusta, que exhibirá en su vitrina. Con su anterior crédito compró un equipo de cómputos con el que ha fortalecido su negocio. Su meta es lograr tener una casa propia para agregar más bienestar a su familia conformada por su cónyuge y sus 2 hijos en las edades de 19 a 23 años.
texts.en:
Ofir, 39, is the owner of an internet cafe, where she offers communication services, including: mobile phone minutes; local, domestic, and international phone calls; photocopies; and confection sales. She started this business seven years ago selling minutes on the terrace of her house, with a pair of borrowed cell phones. Little by little, with the support of her mother and a lot of discipline, she has been adding other services like photocopying, internet, and sweets. Today she has five computers, a suitable location, nine cell phones plans, photocopiers, top up service and a lot of demand for her services. 

Her facilities are open to the public from seven in the morning until nine at night from Monday to Sunday. She buys her supplies in cash and pays her communication bills monthly. Her main customers are her neighbors, students at nearby schools, passers-by, and visitors to the neighborhood, who are tourists that come to enjoy the delicious seafood dishes in nearby pubs. Her Kiva loan is the second one that Fundación Mario Santo Domingo makes, through which she will buy supplies like paper, ink, and a supply of sweets that her customers like, which she will display in her shop window.

With her previous loan, she bought computer equipment with which she strengthened her business. Her goal is to be able to have her own house to add to the well-being of her family, formed by her spouse and her two children, ages 19 and 23.

loans.use: to buy supplies like paper, ink and a supply of confections.

loans.name: Grace

texts.en:
Grace is a resident of Malindi in the Coast province of Kenya. She is married and has three children.

She owns a grocery store, a business that she has been operating for one year. She learned about Milango through a friend who invited her to the group, and she ultimately joined with the goal of accessing credit to improve her business. Her main challenge is finding and attracting customers.

Grace is applying for a loan in the amount of 21,100 KES to purchase fruit and to renovate her grocery store. Any extra income she generates from the loan will be added to her savings to improve her family's standard of living. She aspires to open a wholesale grocery store and to become a supplier of more food products in the future.

loans.use: To purchase additional fruit and to renovate her grocery store.

loans.name: Valentina

texts.ru:
Валентина – разведена. Она живет и работает в Новой Каховке. Она торгует женской трикотажной одеждой на местном рынке. Валентина арендует землю у администрации рынка, владея бутиком на три торговых места. В торговле она уже 17 лет. 

Валентина планирует вложить средства, полученные от КИВА в размере 22 000 гривен в закупку осенней, зимней трикотажной одежды, а именно, кофт, свитеров, юбок, костюмов оптом для последующей розничной реализации. Она планирует заниматься бизнесом и в дальнейшем, расширяя свое торговое место и ассортимент одежды.
texts.en: Valentina is divorced.  She lives and works in Novaya Kahovka.  She sells women's knitted clothing at a local market.  Valentina leases the land from the market administration, but owns her boutique for three retail spaces.  She has been in sales for 17 years.  Valentina plans to invest the 22,000 hryvnia Kiva loan into a purchase of fall and winter knitwear, particularly cardigans, sweaters, skirts and suits, wholesale for a subsequent retail sale.  She plans to continue being involved in the business and wants to expand her retail space and clothing selection.

loans.use: to purchase fall and winter knitwear

loans.name: Nataliya

texts.ru:
Наталия живет в курортном городе Трускавце. Она расположила свою торговую точку недалеко от бювета, где все отдыхающие пьют лечебную воду «Нафтуся». Там Наталия торгует сувенирами ручной работы, изделиями из дерева. Эти товары пользуются популярностью у отдыхающих. Наталия занимается этим бизнесом уже 8 лет. Наиболее популярные среди ее товаров – резные шкатулки, деревянные часы, обереги, иконы в рамках, разные аксессуары, матрешки, деревянные подставки, лопатки и ложки.    

Наталии необходим кредит в размере 5 000 гривен для приобретения ролокассет для новой торговой точки. Полученную прибыль она  планирует потратить на закупку товара для новой точки, чтобы наконец-то запустить и ее, тем самым расширив свою торговлю.
texts.en: Nataliya lives in a resort town of Truskavyets. She situated her retail outlet near a mineral springs location, where visitors drink healing water "Naftusya."  There, Nataliya sells hand-made souvenirs, made from wood.  These goods are popular among the visitors.  Nataliya has been involved in this business for 8 years.  Her most popular goods are carved small jewelry boxes, wooden clocks, charms, framed icons, various accessories, matryoshka dolls, wooden stands, spatulas and spoons.  Nataliya needs a loan in the amount of 5,000 hryvnia to purchase roller blinds for her new retail outlet.  She plans to spend the resulting profit to purchase merchandise for the new retail outlet in order to finally get it going and expand her sales.

loans.use: to purchase roller blinds for her new retail outlet

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy prawns and shrimps

loans.name: Irina

texts.ru:
Ирина живет и работает в Мелитополе. Она торгует на одном из местных городских рынков, реализуя детскую одежду и обувь. Платья, кофты, блузы и обувь являются самым ходовым товаром у Ирины на данный момент. У нее есть свое торговое место, опыт работы составляет около 16 лет. 

Ирине необходимы дополнительные средства в размере 5 000 гривен для того, чтобы закупить товар к школьному сезону. Имея огромный опыт работы с данной группой товаров и желание вкладывать в свое дело, Ирина надеется и дальше развивать свой бизнес, обеспечивая свою семью всем необходимым.
texts.en: Irina lives and works in Melitopol.  She sells children's clothing and shoes at one of the local city markets.  Dresses, cardigans, blouses and shoes are among Irina's most popular merchandise now.  She has her own retail outlet, and her work experience is about 16 years.  Irina needs additional money in the amount of 5,000 hryvnia to purchase merchandise for the school season.  Having extensive work experience with this merchandise group and a desire to invest in her business, Irina hopes to continue developing her business and provide everything necessary for her family.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise for the school season

loans.name: Elkin Jaime

texts.es:
Elkin trabajó durante 14 años en una finca donde realizaba las labores de mantenimiento de la misma y desde hace 4 años buscando tener mejores condiciones económicas, decidió montar su propio negocio donde presta el servicio de arreglo y mantenimiento de jardines. Gracias a este negocio ha logrado salir adelante y brindarles a su esposa y sus 5 hijos una mejor calidad de vida en su hogar, y debido a que los 5 hijos aún se encuentran estudiando, ha logrado ofrecerles el acceso a una educación de mejor calidad. Su negocio ha venido creciendo mucho y esto ha hecho que su principal herramienta de averiara, y ya que no cuenta con un capital suficiente para su arreglo, Elkin busca un préstamo para reparar su guadañadora y continuar generando los ingresos que requiere en su hogar.

Su sueño es poder tener un gran negocio donde pueda generar empleo para las personas más necesitadas de su municipio y también espera que sus hijos pueda seguir teniendo una buena calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Elkin worked doing maintenance on a farm for 14 years.  Four years ago, when he was looking for better financial conditions, he decided to establish his own business of garden maintenance and care services.  Thanks to this business he has managed to get ahead and to give his wife and five children a better quality of life in their home.  Because his five children are still in school, he has managed to give them access to a better quality education.  

His business has been growing a lot, and this has caused damage to his primary tool.  He does not have enough capital to fix it.  Elkin is looking for a loan to repair his hay mower and to continue generating the income his household needs.

His dream is to be able to have a large business where he is able to generate employment for the people most in need in his municipality.  He also hopes that his children are able to continue having a good quality of life.

loans.use: to repair his hay mower and continue generating the income his household needs.

loans.name: Oscar De Jesus

texts.es:
Oscar ha seguido trabajando el negocio que viene de trascendencia familiar desde sus abuelos y que sus padres le enseñaron que es la producción de alimentos. Desde muy pequeño aprendió junto a su madre la actividad y ahora que se encuentra casado y tiene 3 hijos, esta es la fuente de ingresos que le permite brindarle a su familia una buena calidad de vida. A pesar de las grandes dificultades que siempre se le presentan, ha tenido una gran fortaleza para superarlas y poder seguir saliendo adelante para que su familia tenga el sustento diario y las posibilidades de tener mejores oportunidades económicas para progresar. Oscar busca un préstamo para comprar una mesa de acero inoxidable para realizar la producción de los alimentos en mejores condiciones.

Su sueño es seguir con este negocio de trascendencia familiar y hacer que se posicione para que sus hijos también tengan la oportunidad de tener una fuente de ingresos estable para su futuro.
texts.en:
Oscar has continued working in the family business started by his grandparents, which his parents taught him. He makes food. He learned the business from his mother when he was young, and now that he is married with three children, his business is the source of income which allows him to provide his family with a good life. In spite of the big challenges that always come up, he has had the strength to overcome them and be able to continue getting ahead. As a result, his family has what it needs on a daily basis, not to mention the possibility of having better economic opportunities to get ahead. Oscar is requesting a loan so he can purchase a stainless steel table which he will use to provide better conditions for food preparation.

His dream is to continue with his family business and position it so that his children will also have the opportunity to have a stable source of income in the future.

loans.use: to purchase a stainless steel table which he will use to provide better conditions for food preparation.

loans.name: Maria Elizabeth

texts.es: Maria tiene 34 años y trabaja en el negocio familiar el cual inicio junto a su esposo, empezó con una tienda pequeña gracias a un capital invertido el cual creció poco a poco, con ese aumento comenzó a invertir en ropa la cual compraba y vendía por pedido convirtiendo su tienda en un bazar donde se podía encontrar diversidad de productos hasta bisutería.
