Allí en un ambiente soleado, de playa, brisa y mar, Leonora tiene un restaurante, experiencia que inició desde hace 3 años, cuando inició vendiendo comidas los fines de semana, aprovechando que las familias se toman un descanso en la preparación de alimentos y compran el almuerzo y la cena, por eso Leonora inició en la terraza de su casa. Muy prontamente su clientela creció y  ella aumentó la oferta de sus menús adicionando comidas autóctonas de la región, bien preparadas. En su negocio elabora los productos alimenticios en las horas de la mañana y  su hijo trabaja en la atención de su clientela al medio día. Sus compras las realiza a diario  y en las cantidades exactas y sus ventas las hace también de contado y en la misma frecuencia. En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el cual comprará materiales e insumos para la preparación de sus alimentos, mesas plásticas, sillas, refrescos y productos desechables para ofrecer su servicio a domicilio. Con su inversión de credikiva, ofrecerá un mejor servicio a su clientela, con lo cual continuará fidelizándola para sostenerse en el mercado.
texts.en: Leonora is 40 and lives with her three children, ages 14 to 26. They live in the city Cartagena de Indias, which has developed as an urban area while still conserving its historic center and has become one of the most important ports in Colombia, the Caribbean, and the world. It is also a popular tourist destination. There in the sunny ocean-side environment Leonara runs a restaurant. She began this business three years ago selling food on weekends. She took advantage of families who wanted to take a break from preparing food, so she started selling lunches and dinners on the terrace of her house. Her customer base rapidly grew, and she began adding dishes to her menu focusing on well-prepared traditional regional dishes. She does the cooking in the morning, while her son deals with the customers during the day. She makes her purchases daily in precise quantities, and she also keeps records of her sales every day. Currently she is applying for her first loan from Kiva and the Mario Santo Domingo Foundation. She will use the loan to purchase supplies to make food, plastic tables and chairs, sodas, and disposable containers so that she can offer home delivery. With her loan from Kiva she will be able to provide better service to her clientele, which will build loyalty and help her maintain her position in the marketplace.

loans.use: purchase supplies for her restaurant, plastic tables and chairs, soda, and disposable containers in order to offer home delivery.

loans.name: Mercy Maribel

texts.es:
MERCY MARIBEL TIENE 27 AÑOS ES SOLTERA VIVE CON LOS PADRES NO TIENE HIJOS.

MERCY SE DEDICA A LA AGRICULTURA EN LA SIEMBRA DE MAIZ TRIGO PAPAS CEBADA EN TERRENOS ARRENDADAS, EN DINERO LO SOLICITA PARA LA COMPRAR DE ABONOS Y FERTILIZANTES INSECTICIDAS PARA LOS CULTIVOS, EL DIENRO LE AYUDADO AUMENTAR LA PRODUCCION Y TENER PRODUCTOS DE CALIDAD.

MERCY SUEÑA CON PODER COMPRAR TERRENOS PARA TENER SU PROPIA PRODUCCION Y EN LOS TIEMPOS LIBRES SE DEDICA A DESCANZAR CON EL LA FAILIA.
texts.en:
Mercy Maribel, 27, is single and lives with her parents. She doesn't have any children.

Mercy is a farmer, planting corn, wheat, potatoes and barley on rented farm land. She asks for money to buy compost, fertilizers and insecticides for her crops. The money will help her to increase production and have good quality products.

Mercy dreams of being able to buy land so she can have her own production. In her free time she likes to rest with her family.

loans.use: to buy compost and fertilizers.

loans.name: Nurkim

texts.en: Nurkim is married and has three children. She is 53-years-old and resides in the village of Gabunon in the municipality of Tambulig. Nurkim owns and operates a retail store, selling a variety of products to earn a living. She's been in this business for 6 years. Each month, she earns 3,000 PHP doing this type of work. She requested a loan of 5,000 PHP to purchase additional products such as canned goods, noodles, sugar, and coffee. Recently, Nurkim joined GDMPC. In the future, Nurkim wants to build a house.

loans.use: to purchase additional products such as canned goods, noodles, sugar, and coffee.

loans.name: María Del Carmen

texts.es: María es una persona muy alegre y trabajador quien cuenta con muy buenas referencias de sus vecinos, ya que es muy responsable y amigable. Ella vive junto a su esposo y con quien trabaja en su propio negocio. María se dedica a la venta de sodas y de gas propano, el cual comercializa en su casa de habitación lo cual es muy positivo para ella debido a que se puede dedicar también de lleno en su hogar. María cuenta con muchos clientes ya que es una persona muy confiable y querida en el lugar, es por esta razón que ella solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, por medio del cual pueda invertir en la compra de más cilindros de gas propano y así mismo para comprar mayor cantidad de sodas en diversos sabores y tamaños.
texts.en: Maria is a happy and hardworking person. She has a lot of good references from her neighbors because she is very responsible and friendly. She lives with her husband and works with him at his business. Maria sells sodas and propane gas out of her home, which is good for her because she can also take care of her household. Maria has a lot of customers because she's well-trusted and loved in her area. For that reason, she asks for a loan from INTEGRAL, which she will invest in more propane gas cylinders and also to buy more sodas in different flavors and sizes.

loans.use: to buy sodas and propane gas for resale.

loans.name: 07.01.70 Phú Sơn 1 Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Mầu works in agriculture, farming poultry and cattle. She is requesting a loan to purchase poultry and cattle to raise and resell in the future.

Mầu is 68 years old, and she is married with 2 children.
Mầu is the group leader of the 70 Phú Sơn 1 solidarity group, which consists of 4 members. 
She lives and works in Thanh Hoa City, an urban area in Thanh Hoa province, with no dependents as her children are grown up.

This is Mầu's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.
Mầu has been involved in this business for 5 years.
The main hardship that Mầu faces in her business is the lack of capital.

With her business profit, Mầu hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her business to do well, and for her children to do well in school.

loans.use: to purchase poultry and cattle to raise and resell in the future.

loans.name: 07.01.69 Phú Sơn1 Group

texts.en:
Hà works in agriculture by farming poultry and cattle. She is requesting a loan to purchase poultry and cattle to raise.
Hà is 53-years-old, and she is married with one child. Hà lives with one dependent in Thanh Hoa City, an urban town in Thanh Hoa Province.
Hà is the group leader of the 07.01.69 Phú Sơn 1 Group, which consists of four members.
This is Hà’s first loan with Fund for Thanh Hoa Poor Women. Hà has been involved in her business for 5 years. One of the most critical business difficulties that concern her is a lack of capital.
With her business profit, Hà hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her business to do well, and for her children to do well in school.

loans.use: to purchase poultry and cattle to raise.

loans.name: Danila

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de cueros,la socia hace carteras,bolsos,monedores y billeteras,la socia los hace los trabajos y luego los vende al por mayor a las diferentes tiendas donde vende los productos de cuero,la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene 7 años en este negocio,el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde se pueda vender los productos de cuero.La socia solicita el credito para comprar cuero e hilos.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The lending club member continues with her business selling leather goods. She purses, wallets, bags, coin purses and wallets. She makes the products and later sells them in bulk to different stores where they sell leather goods. She works from 8am to 6pm. She has been doing this for seven years now. Her dream is to have a store where she can sell leather goods. She asks for a loan to buy leather and thread.

She is happy about the loan and promises to make her payments.

loans.use: to buy leather and thread.

loans.name: 07.01.67 Phú Sơn 1 Group

texts.en:
Hảo has a retail business selling dry food. She is requesting a loan to purchase dry food to resell.
Hảo is 58-years-old. She is married and has one child. She lives and works in Thanh Hoa City, an urban area in Thanh Hoa Province, with one dependent.
Hảo is the group leader of the 07.01.67 Phú Sơn 1 Group, which consists of three members.
This is Hảo’s first loan with Fund for Thanh Hoa Poor Women. Hảo has been involved in her business for 5 years. The main hardship that Hảo faces in her business is a lack of capital.
With her business profit, Hảo hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her business to do well, and for her children to do well in school.

loans.use: to purchase dry food to resell.

loans.name: Susan

texts.en: Susan is married and is the mother of three dependent children. She is 47 years old and lives in the village of Lower Lodiong in the municipality of Tambulig. Susan makes and sells snack items to earn a living and has had this business for 5 years. She earns 5,500 PHP each month doing this type of work. She has requested a loan of 8,500 PHP from GDMPC to purchase raw ingredients needed to make products for sale. Susan joined GDMPC in 2009. In the future, she hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase raw ingredients needed to make products for sale.

loans.name: Juan Jorge

texts.es: EL SR. JUAN TIENE 39 AÑOS DE EDAD, ESTA CASADO CON ROSA Y TIENEN 2 HIJOS. EL TRABAJA EN UNA EMPRESA DE FERROCARRILES DESDE HACE 16 AÑOS, GRACIAS A SU TRABAJO HA PODIDO SOLVENTAR LAS NECESIDADES EN SU HOGAR HASTA EL DIA DE HOY. EN ESTA OCASION REFIERE QUE SU HIJA MAYOR ENTRARA A ESTUDIAR LA UNIVERSIDAD POR LO CUAL EL RECURRE A UNA SOLICITUD DE CREDITO PARA PODER CUBRIR LOS GASTOS DEL PAGO DE LA COLEGIATURA INICIAL Y ADEMAS REALIZAR LA COMPRA DE MATERIALES Y UTILES ESCOLARES DE SUS HIJOS.
texts.en: Juan, 39, is married to Rosa and they have two children. He has worked on a railroad for 16 years. Thanks to his job they have been able to meet their household needs until now. His oldest daughter will begin her university studies and he asks for a loan to cover her initial college fees and also to buy materials and school supplies for his kids.

loans.use: to pay university fees.

loans.name: Terry

texts.en:
Terry is 37 years old and married with three children.

Terry works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 16,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) loan through NWTF to buy additional items to sell.

Terry has borrowed and repaid six loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for five years and also earns an income from selling rice, spices, fruits and vegetables.

Terry aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional items to sell.

loans.name: Gladis Consuelo

texts.es: Gladis de 29 años de edad, vive junto a sus dos pequeños hijos de 8 y 5 años de edad, ella es una madre muy responsable quien se entrega de lleno a su negocio junto a su suegra para contar con todo lo necesario en el hogar. Ella posee una pequeña tienda en su casa de habitación en donde comercializa: pan, aceite para cocina y algunos cosméticos entre otros productos, cuenta con clientes fijo, razón principal por la que desea contar con el dinero necesario para invertir en la compra de huevos, productos para el hogar como jabones y desinfectantes, bebidas y otros más. Gladis solicita el préstamo  a INTEGRAL con lo que espera alcanzar lo anterior y de esta forma contar con una estabilidad económica para sus hijos y su suegra quien es un gran apoyo para Gladis.
texts.en: Gladis, 29, lives with her two young children, ages 8 and 5. She is a responsible mother who tends to her business along with her mother-in-law so that their home has everything it needs. She has a small store in her house where she sells bread, cooking oil and some cosmetics, among other things. She has established customers and she wants to have enough capital to buy eggs, household products like soaps and disinfectants, drinks and other things. Gladis asks for a loan from INTEGRAL so that she can buy those things and create economic stability for her children and her mother-in-law, who is a big support to Gladis.

loans.use: to buy detergent and drinks to stock her store.
